.. _releases-0.8:

=======================================
 Transifex version 0.8.x release notes
=======================================


Transifex 0.8 (Under Development)
=================================

Welcome to the Transifex 0.8 release.

To be released:
  Nov/Dec 2009

This is Transifex's current development release. It might eat your babies.

Transifex 0.7 is intended for development use.
